meanings.definition: Not kind; lacking in kindness or mercy.
meanings.sent1: The unkindest person I know never helps others.
meanings.sent2: She showed her unkindest side when she refused to share her toys.
meanings.sent3: It was unkindest of him to ignore his friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The storm's unkindest blow was destroying the fragile flowers.
meanings.sent5: The unkindest words can leave lasting scars on the heart.

meanings.sent1: He was the unkindest of all the bullies in school.
meanings.sent2: The unkindest cut is when someone you trust betrays you.
meanings.sent3: It was the unkindest joke, but we couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unkindest truth is sometimes the hardest to accept.
meanings.sent5: Her unkindest criticism made him rethink his actions.
